Rulings.Edison:
●If you have two Revival Jams on the field, you may redirect an attack to either one of your choosing.
●If you have Jam Defender, Revival Jam, and a monster equipped with your Ring of Magnetism on your side of the field, you may redirect an attack to Revival Jam when you opponent attacks the monster equipped with Ring of Magnetism.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you have two copies of "Revival Jam" on the field, you may redirect an attack to either one of your choosing.\n2. If you have "Jam Defender", "Revival Jam", and a monster equipped with your "Ring of Magnetism" on your side of the field, you may redirect an attack to "Revival Jam" when you opponent attacks the monster equipped with "Ring of Magnetism".
